title: The Dramatics: A Comedy
overview: When an out of work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriendâ€™s worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for.
